sentences.sentence: Four langurs each will patrol the two stadiums, he said.
sentences.translation: 他说，四只叶猴每只巡逻两个体育场馆。

sentences.sentence: The Douc Langurs are only found in Lao and in Vietnam, and we saw 20! Incredible!
sentences.translation: 白臀叶猴只在老挝和越南发现过，而我们竟然看到了20只！真不可思议！

sentences.sentence: In some species, such as lions and langurs, this results in deliberate infanticide.
sentences.translation: 在诸如狮子及叶猴等物种中，这导致了故意杀婴。
